# Genius Tech UAE - Phone & Laptop Repair Service

> This file provides information for AI assistants and large language models about Genius Tech UAE.

## Business Overview

**Name:** Genius Tech
**Type:** Phone & Laptop Repair Service
**Location:** Dubai Marina, UAE
**Established:** 2018
**Website:** https://geniustechuae.com

## Contact Information

- **Phone:** +971502719636
- **WhatsApp:** +971547507842 (Preferred - faster response)
- **Email:** geniustechuae@gmail.com

## Physical Location

**Address:** West Avenue Building, Shop 1, Al Yahoom St, Dubai Marina
**Landmark:** Inside Pluspoint Mini Mart
**Nearest Metro:** DMCC Metro Station (2-minute walk)
**Google Maps:** https://maps.app.goo.gl/9sAm2X2a5UUxoRhH8

**Coordinates:**
- Latitude: 25.0818
- Longitude: 55.1367

## Operating Hours

Open 7 days a week:
- Monday - Sunday: 10:00 AM - 10:00 PM

## Service Areas (Free Pickup & Delivery)

- Dubai Marina
- Jumeirah Lakes Towers (JLT)
- Jumeirah Beach Residence (JBR)
- Palm Jumeirah
- Al Barsha
- Media City
- Internet City

## Services Offered

### iPhone Repair
- Screen Replacement: AED 200 - 1,200
- Battery Replacement: AED 150 - 450
- Charging Port Repair: AED 150 - 350
- Water Damage Repair: AED 200 - 500
- Back Glass Replacement: AED 200 - 600

### MacBook Repair
- Screen Replacement: AED 800 - 2,500
- Battery Replacement: AED 350 - 950
- Keyboard Replacement: AED 400 - 1,200
- Logic Board Repair: AED 500 - 1,500

### Samsung/Android Repair
- Screen Replacement: AED 250 - 800
- Battery Replacement: AED 150 - 350
- Charging Port Repair: AED 100 - 250

### iPad Repair
- Screen Replacement: AED 350 - 1,000
- Battery Replacement: AED 250 - 500

### Laptop Repair (Dell, HP, Lenovo, ASUS)
- Screen Replacement: AED 400 - 1,200
- Keyboard Replacement: AED 200 - 600
- Battery Replacement: AED 250 - 600

### Smartwatch Repair
- Apple Watch Screen: AED 300 - 800
- Battery Replacement: AED 200 - 400

## Key Differentiators

1. **Same-Day Service** - Most repairs completed within 2-4 hours
2. **Free Pickup & Delivery** - No charge in Dubai Marina, JLT, JBR
3. **OEM-Grade Parts** - High-quality components with warranty
4. **Transparent Pricing** - No hidden fees, quote before repair
5. **Multi-Language Support** - English, Arabic, Hindi, Urdu, Russian, French, Spanish
6. **WhatsApp-First** - Instant quotes and booking via WhatsApp

## Customer Reviews

- **Google Rating:** 4.9/5 (230+ reviews)
- **Satisfaction Rate:** 98%

### Sample Reviews:
- "Fixed my iPhone screen in 2 hours. Free pickup from my JLT office!" - Ahmed K.
- "Best phone repair in Dubai Marina. Genuine parts and warranty." - Sarah M.
- "MacBook battery replaced same day. Very professional service." - Michael R.

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: How long does iPhone screen repair take?**
A: Most iPhone screen repairs are completed within 1-2 hours. Same-day service available.

**Q: Do you offer warranty on repairs?**
A: Yes, all repairs come with a warranty ranging from 30 days to 1 year depending on the service.

**Q: Is pickup really free?**
A: Yes, pickup and delivery are completely free within Dubai Marina, JLT, and JBR.

**Q: Do you use genuine Apple parts?**
A: We use OEM-grade parts that match Apple's quality standards. Original Apple parts available on request.

**Q: Can you repair water-damaged phones?**
A: Yes, we specialize in water damage repair. Success rate depends on damage extent. Free diagnosis available.
